page.title: 17Football in 2011
page.content:
Football is one of the most popular sports in the world.

In 2011 Manchester United won the Premier League it was their 19th title which puts them one above Liverpool.

This year Manchester United has bought Ashley Young, Phil Jones and David de Gea.

Barcelona won the Champions League and Manchester united came second.

Barcelona won La Liga and Real Madrid came second and Valencia came 3rd.

Ronaldo, who plays for Real Madrid, is worth Â£80 million!!!

Ronaldinho was the most skilful player in the world.

Manchester city won the .F.A and Birmingham won the carling cup.



In the Championship Queens Park Rangers came first and Norwich came second. Swansea city won the play offs so they have got promotion to the Premier League.

If you want to go and play for a football team you could go and play for Arnold Town or Bestwood Park Rangers.

My favourite football team is Nottingham Forest and my favourite player is Robbie Findley.

GLADE HILL SCHOOL FOOTBALL TEAM

The school football team train on Mondays we play our matchers at south glade we play all different teams such as

Southglade , Hayden and Seely.

The football team players are Thomas W, Thomas U, Chrystal, Oliver, Kadyn, Louis, Morgan and Ryan.



By Ryan.


Class 6 Gladehill
